bankTeller

Class BankTeller

  • java.lang.Object
    • bankTeller.BankTeller

  • public class BankTeller
extends java.lang.Object
    The BankTeller class is the user interface class to take in inputs and output the results. Wherever there are invalid or errors in the inputs, it is capable of displaying an error message and state the error. Also able to do various exception handling.
    Author:
    Jah C Speed, Abe Vitangcol

    • Method Detail

      • captureInput

        private void captureInput(java.util.Scanner sc)
        Scans the user input(s) and does command(s) based on the inputs given. Able to capture single or multiple lines of input.
        Parameters:
        sc - The scanner that scans the user inputs and parses them.

      • checkingAccount

        private Account checkingAccount(Profile profile,
                                java.lang.String balance)
        Opens a checking account given a starting balance and a profile of the person using it.
        Parameters:
        profile - The identifications of a person (fname, lname, dob) balance The starting amount of money to open the account.
        Returns:
        null if an invalid deposit was made, a duplicate account is in the database, or the account was reopened. The newly created account, newAcc, otherwise.

      • closeAccountCommand

        private Account closeAccountCommand(java.lang.String accountType,
                                    Profile profile,
                                    int paramSize)
        Attempts to close an account based on the type to be closed and the person holding the account.
        Parameters:
        accountType - The type of account to be closed. profile The identifications of a person using the account (fname, lname, dob) paramSize The number of parameters of the given line.
        Returns:
        The account that was closed, null otherwise.

      • closeCheckingAccount

        private Account closeCheckingAccount(Profile profile)
        Closes a checking account given a profile.
        Parameters:
        profile - The identifications of the person using the account (fname, lname, dob)
        Returns:
        null if the account was not found in the database The newly created account to find and close otherwise.

      • closeCollegeCheckingAccount

        private Account closeCollegeCheckingAccount(Profile profile)
        Closes a college checking account given a profile.
        Parameters:
        profile - The identifications of the person using the account (fname, lname, dob)
        Returns:
        null if the account was not found in the database The newly created account to find and close otherwise.

        Returns:

      • closeSavingsAccount

        private Account closeSavingsAccount(Profile profile)
        Closes a savings account given a profile.
        Parameters:
        profile - The identifications of the person using the account (fname, lname, dob)
        Returns:
        null if the account was not found in the database The newly created account to find and close otherwise.

      • collageCheckingAccount

        private Account collageCheckingAccount(Profile profile,
                                       java.lang.String balance,
                                       java.lang.String code)
        Opens a college checking account given a profile, starting balance, and a campus code.
        Parameters:
        profile - The identifications of a person using the account (fname, lname, dob) balance The starting amount of money to open the account. code The campus code required to open the account. Cannot open the account with a wrong code.
        Returns:
        null if an invalid deposit was made, an invalid campus code was inputed, a duplicate account was found in the database, or the account was reopened. The newly created account, newAcc, otherwise.

      • depositCommand

        private Account depositCommand(java.lang.String accountType,
                               Profile profile,
                               java.lang.String balance,
                               int paramSize)
        Tries to deposit an amount for a specific account with a specific profile and type of account used.
        Parameters:
        accountType - The type of account to deposit into (savings, checking, etc.) profile The identifications of a person using the account (fname, lname, dob) balance The amount to deposit into the account. paramSize The number of parameters of the given line.
        Returns:
        null if the balance was invalid or missing in the command or if the account type was invalid. The new account created to find and deposit into otherwise.

      • doCommand

        private void doCommand(int intendingCommand,
                       java.lang.String accountType,
                       Profile profile,
                       java.lang.String amount,
                       java.lang.String code,
                       int paramSize)
        Performs a command that requires additional params to execute. Deals with Opening, Closing, Depositing, and Withdrawing from accounts.
        Parameters:
        intendingCommand - The command to be done after obtaining the id number accountType The type of account to be used (for deposit, withdrawal, opening or closing) profile The identifications of a person (fname, lname, dob). amount The amount to withdraw or deposit in the account. code The campus code for a college account, if applicable. paramSize The amount of parameters a given line has.

      • doNoNameCommand

        private int doNoNameCommand(int command)
        Performs a command, primarily printing commands, updating commands, or the stop command. None of these commands require further params.
        Parameters:
        command - The command typed in that wants to be executed.
        Returns:
        0 if the command has been done successfully or if invalid, -1 otherwise.

      • endBankTeller

        private void endBankTeller()
        Ends the BankTeller and stops taking in commands.

      • getCommand

        private int getCommand(java.lang.String input)
        Gets the id of the command from the string command.
        Parameters:
        input - The command string inputted into the system
        Returns:
        The proper id of the command, -1 otherwise.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main method to run the BankTeller.
        Parameters:
        args - any arguments used along with the call for BankTeller. Unused.

      • moneyMarketAccount

        private Account moneyMarketAccount(Profile profile,
                                   java.lang.String balance)
        Opens a money market account given a profile and a starting balance.
        Parameters:
        profile - The identifications of a person using the account (fname, lname, dob) balance The starting amount of money to put into the account.
        Returns:
        null if an invalid deposit was made, the balance was not at least $2500 to open, a duplicate account was found in the database, or the account was reopened. The newly created account, newAcc, otherwise.

      • openAccountCommand

        private Account openAccountCommand(java.lang.String accountType,
                                   Profile profile,
                                   java.lang.String balance,
                                   java.lang.String code,
                                   int paramSize)
        Attempts to open an account based on the params given.
        Parameters:
        accountType - profile The identifications of a person (fname, lname, dob) balance The amount to deposit into the new account. code The campus code for a college checking account, if applicable and necessary. paramSize The number of parameters in the given line.
        Returns:
        The account created based on the accountType given if there are no problems. null otherwise (a problem was encountered in making the account)

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the Bank Teller to continuously allow inputs until it has been stopped. Takes batch commands or single commands.

      • savingsAccount

        private Account savingsAccount(Profile profile,
                               java.lang.String balance,
                               java.lang.String code)
        Opens a savings account given a profile, starting balance, and loyalty code.
        Parameters:
        profile - The identifications of a person using the account (fname, lname, dob) balance The starting amount of money to put into the account. code A number that is either 0 or 1. States if the holder is loyal or not.
        Returns:
        null if an invalid deposit was made, an invalid loyalty code was inputed, a duplicate account was found in the database, or the account was reopened. The newly created account, newAcc, otherwise.

      • withdrawCommand

        private Account withdrawCommand(java.lang.String accountType,
                                Profile profile,
                                java.lang.String balance,
                                int paramSize)
        Tries to withdraw money from a specific account with a specific profile and account type.
        Parameters:
        accountType - The type of account to be withdrawn from (savings, checking, etc.) profile The identifications of the person using the account (fname, lname, dob) balance The amount of money to withdraw from the account. paramSize The number of parameters in the given line.
        Returns:
        null if the balance was invalid or missing in the command or if the account type was invalid. The new account created to find and withdraw from otherwise.
